contacts.name: Jing Yuan
contacts.signature: I'm not at the Seat of Divine Foresight

201020000.text: {NICKNAME}, is everything alright on the Express?

201020001.text: Seems fine, are you feeling alright?

201020002.text: Haha, nothing too serious. After a few days cooped up in the apothecary, my injuries have healed to the point of being negligible.

201020003.text: It must've been because that fight was close to the Ambrosial Arbor, so my body's healing speed exceeded all expectations.

201020004.text: What made you think of us, General?

201020005.text: The Express Crew are my friends who went through life and death with me. Isn't it normal to think about my friends?

201020006.text: By the way, {NICKNAME}, perhaps you've already heard from Dan Heng about some recent events.

201020007.text: My mentor has returned to the Luofu, gathering old friends to settle past grudges. She sent an anonymous letter to the Express to invite Dan Heng, which is quite... abrupt. I hope it hasn't caused any disturbance to everyone.

201020008.text: No worries, we have weathered worse storms

201020009.text: Your mentor is something else to be able to move on the Express unnoticed. After I found the letter, I only told Pom-Pom and Dan Heng, no one else

201020010.text: Your mentor is something else to be able to leave the letter on the Express unnoticed

201020012.text: I only told the conductor and Dan Heng, no one else. Pom-Pom seems a little worried...

201020013.text: Please relay my apology to the conductor for the rudeness of my mentor.

201020014.text: Dan Heng looked really serious after I received the letter. Is he okay?

201020015.text: Dan Heng accepted the invitation. I admire his courage in facing the karma of his past life and understand his determination in this life. I will do my best to defuse the hostility that the Luofu has toward him.

201020016.text: The matters regarding Dan Heng should come to a temporary conclusion. However, it seems the Alliance's situation is about to change again.

201020017.text: I hear the Express will be journeying far again. I hope for your peace and safety.

201020019.text: Dan Heng, I, and everyone else on the Express will definitely come back to visit!

201020020.text: Alright, I have a little something for everyone, consider it an apology for the troubles.

201020021.text: If you require any aid or need a place to dock the Express, the Luofu will forever welcome your contingent.
